00038 class KviMaskEditor;

00040 
00041 typedef struct _KviMaskEntry
00042 {
00043         QString szMask;
00044         QString szSetBy;
00045         unsigned int uSetAt;
00046 } KviMaskEntry;
00047 
00048 class KviMaskItem: public QTreeWidgetItem
00049 {
00050 public:
00051         KviMaskItem(QTreeWidget* parent,KviMaskEntry* entry);
00052         ~KviMaskItem();
00053 
00054         KviMaskEntry* mask() { return &m_Mask; };
00055 protected:
00056         KviMaskEntry m_Mask;
00057         bool operator<(const QTreeWidgetItem &other)const
00058         {
00059                 // This is the sorting function for KviMaskItem
00060                 switch(treeWidget()->sortColumn())
00061                 {
00062                         case 0:
00063                                 return m_Mask.szMask < ((KviMaskItem *) &other)->mask()->szMask;
00064                                 break;
00065                         case 1:
00066                                 return m_Mask.szSetBy < ((KviMaskItem*) &other)->mask()->szSetBy;
00067                                 break;
00068                         case 2:
00069                                 return m_Mask.uSetAt < ((KviMaskItem*) &other)->mask()->uSetAt;
00070                                 break;
00071                 }
00072                 return 0; //make compiler happy
00073         }
00074 
00075 };
00076
